articles.title: The NBA is offering players a 'smart' ring to track Covid. But does it even work?
articles.description: The NBA, which hopes to restart the season July 30, says it is offering players a ring whose maker claims it can track a user's health data and even predict if users are about to show symptoms of coronavirus infection.
